title: Perfect place to call home! Close distance to shopping! BIG Specials!
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 81', 'OR Text', '81', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 982 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Where style meets comfort and space meets taste!', 'Conveniently located off the 215 and South Russell Road our community features one of the largest floor plans in the area while also featuring one of the smallest communities in the area.', 'With only 187 gated all corner units featuring their own covered patio/balcony we are sure to meet your every customized need.', 'Come live with us in our most open floor plans and enjoy our oversized pool equipped with bbq grills inside or keep active in our fitness center!', 'Get to know our area even further by exploring the neighborhood with nearby shopping centers and parks all within walking distance!', 'Come enjoy traditional living with St. Clair, You’re invited to be our long term Guests.', 'Features:', 'Central AC, Pantry, walk in closets come with shelving.', 'Master bedrooms accommodate king size furniture, Panoramic Windows, Gated, Ice Maker, Ample Cabinet Space, open concept living room, Vertical Blinds, all units come with breakfast bar and open kitchen to living room, Ceiling Fans, Track Lighting, large garden tub.', 'master bedroom in the two bedrooms has linen cubicle.1x1 have additional storage space', 'Community Amenities:', 'Beautifully Manicured Landscaping, Business Center, Spa, BBQ Areas, Wi-Fi Access in Clubhouse, Pool, and Fitness Center, Large Fire Pit, Large Pool, Onsite and On-call Maintenance, Fitness Center', 'Pet Policy', 'Breed / Size Restricted- 35lbs.', '$400 Fee/ $40 Pet Rent', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'LkLhjATi0H3']
